Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at ACHAT Comfort Dresden in Dresden (Suedvorstadt), you'll be convenient to Railway Museum Dresden-Altstadt and Zwinger Palace. This hotel is within close proximity of Theater in der Fabrik and Russian Orthodox Church.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 157 guestrooms. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Limited parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

With a stay at ACHAT Comfort Dresden in Dresden (Suedvorstadt), you'll be convenient to Railway Museum Dresden-Altstadt and Zwinger Palace. This hotel is within close proximity of Theater in der Fabrik and Russian Orthodox Church.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Railway Museum Dresden-Altstadt - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Theater in der Fabrik - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Russian Orthodox Church - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Altmarkt-Galerie Dresden - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Dresden University of Technology - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
State Playhouse Dresden - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Old Market Square - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Church of the Holy Cross - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Dresden Armory - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Porcelain Collection - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Royal Cabinet of Mathematical and Physical Instruments - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Kulturpalast Dresden - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Zwinger Palace - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Muenzkabinett Dresden - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Town Hall Tower - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for ACHAT Comfort Dresden is Dresden (DRS) - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for ACHAT Comfort Hotel Dresden is Dresden (DRS-Dresden Airport) - 10 km / 6.2 mi.
